bike.description: S-Works SJ HT FACT 10M carbon, carbon drive and forged disc dropouts w/ disc mount and replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Soecialized Future Shock S90,  90mm travel, Brain Fade, rebound adj., single sided air spring and damper, carbon 1-1/8" to 1.5" steerer
1-1/8" to 1.5" Threadless, Campy style, cartridge bearing
Custom Shimano BB-91, OS, press-in bearing
36.9mm clamp, one bolt for carbon frame/post
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
